character.statement: We managed to lock him up in the dream machine before he came to. Thanks to you, Zeus won't be bothering anyone ever again. For your trouble, take this.
We won't make that mistake again.
Emergency lockdown! The prisoners from Super Power Island are holding one of our guards in their cells!
Please, go into Zeus's dream and see if you can retrieve that code!
We need your help getting the code from Zeus.
We're safe, thanks to you! Help yourself to something from our gear closet.
Like I said -- we should have locked 'em up and thrown away the key!
Only one person knows the code to those cells. And he's fast asleep!
